sentence.text: These data suggest a previously unrecognized mechanism by which EBNALP coactivates transcription through subverting of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II and thus affects the expression of LCL genes regulated by a broad range of host TFs.IMPORTANCE Epstein-Barr virus was the first human DNA tumor virus discovered over 50 years ago.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
